Lesson 5: Fun with Allmaps!

Not feeling like learning the command line interface for Allmaps? Have fun instead!

here.allmaps.org

Go to here.allmaps.org in your browser and, if prompted, allow the website to access your location.

The maps returned are maps that have been georeferenced using the Allmaps platform. They’re all maps held in digital collections—for example, the AGSL Digital Map Collection. In fact, any map in our collection can be used, and so can maps from any collection that uses IIIF, the International Image Interoperability Framework.
